Title: The Chen Taste Test
Description:
Uncle Chen is going to love this. Or... he might tell us to find something sweeter. He's kind of dumb like that.

Let's get this grain back to him at Halfhill.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Chen Stormstout at Halfhill in the Valley of the Four Winds.
RewardText: Ah! Now these are some beautifully malted grains. The two of you have a good eye and nose.
